author: Larry Plummer
comment: It has great features, if you use the apps they want you to. Which I don't. And the notifications aren't changeable. The publisher responds to all comments with the same canned response that has nothing to do with the review. And now I am getting phone pop up notifications to buy more faces from them. Not impressed by this AT ALL.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue.  We'd like to look into it further for you to get fix it soon ,Thanks for your Feedback

title: Not impressed

author: casey stafford
comment: Very cool but I'd like to see some customization options for the notifications on the left depending on what msg service you use and maybe email

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Recent Update We have updated the app now you can switch on/off the sensors heart rate and also the step sensor sure your watch will long hours as we save battery, RATE us Five star and support us

title: Needs options

author: Mirage December
comment: Drain heavy battery,but Amazing Face.more select app noti on face plz.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Recent Update We have updated the app now you can switch on/off the sensors heart rate and also the step sensor sure your watch will long hours as we save battery, RATE us Five star and support us

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Thank you for your valuable feedback. It encourages us to work more and to seek more and more good reviews.

author: David Frascone
comment: Crashes constantly on Sony Smart watch 3

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi David,Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue We'd like to look into it further for you to get it set up soon ,Thanks for your Feedback
